程序包 starray.java.mono4j

类 MonoThread

java.lang.Object
com.sun.jna.Pointer
starray.java.mono4j.MonoObject
starray.java.mono4j.MonoThread
public class MonoThread extends MonoObject
Mono 线程管理类 Mono thread management class

提供线程附加、分离和管理功能 Provides thread attach, detach and management functionality

  • 字段概要
